properties.Label: Qikiqtarjuaq Airport
properties.Description: The airport for the hamlet of Qikiqtarjuaq. Flights from Iqlauit pass through Pangnirtung and on to Qikiqtarjuaq.

properties.Label: Pangnirtung (Airport)
properties.Description: The airport for the hamlet of Pangnirtung. Flights from Iqlauit pass through Pangnirtung and on to Qikiqtarjuaq.

properties.Label: North Pang  Landing Area
properties.Description: Northern landing area.

properties.Label: Polar Bears
properties.Description: Polar bears inhabit the shoreline. It is recommended that hikers do not linger or camp within 5 km of the northern shoreline.

properties.Label: North Pang Cabin
properties.Description: Most northern emergency shelter on the coast adjacent to the drop off/pick up area.

properties.Label: Owl River Cabin
properties.Description: Emergency shelter on the Owl River.

properties.Label: Glacier Lake Cabin
properties.Description: Emergency shelter to the north of the slope leading to Glacier lake and the high point of the valley.

properties.Label: Summit Lake Cabin
properties.Description: Emergency shelter adjacent to the Parks Canada operations cabin. Commands excellent views south down the valley.

properties.Label: Thor Cabin
properties.Description: Emergency shelter overlooking the popular viewpoint of Mount Thor.

properties.Label: Windy Lakes Cabin
properties.Description: Emergency shelter located on the eastern side of the Weasel River.

properties.Label: Overlord East Cabin
properties.Description: Emergency shelter directly on the coast, adjacent to the high tide drop off/pick up area.

properties.Label: June Valley Cabin
properties.Description: Emergency shelter along the June Valley.

properties.Label: Ulu Cabin
properties.Description: Emergency shelter close to the low tide drop off/pick up area.

properties.Label: Overlord East Landing Area
properties.Description: High tide landing area.

properties.Label: Overlord West Landing Area
properties.Description: Low tide landing area.

properties.Label: Rundel River
properties.Description: The Rundel River can be hazardous to cross during periods of high run off from the glacier.

properties.Label: Circular Lake
properties.Description: Part of glacier lake was cut off from the main body of water to create a beautiful circular pool.

properties.Label: Rockfall danger
properties.Description: Potential rockfall hazard around Thor cabin.

properties.Label: Weasel River
properties.Description: The Weasel River can be extremely danderous to cross while water levels are high. If you wish to cross then look for sections of slow, shaller water.

properties.Label: Rock Garden
properties.Description: A small scenic area.

properties.Label: The Sandcastle
properties.Description: A large sandy moraine.

properties.Label: Potential for high winds
properties.Description: The Windy Valley can experience extremely high winds. Camping is not recommend during windy conditions.
Basic outhouse facility adjacent to cabin.
Basic outhouse facility adjacent to cabin.
Basic outhouse facility adjacent to cabin.
Basic outhouse facility adjacent to cabin.
Basic outhouse facility adjacent to cabin.

properties.Label: Parks Canada - Summit Lake
properties.Description: Use of this cabin is restrcted to Parks Canada staff. No access to hikers.
Basic outhouse facility adjacent to cabin.
Basic outhouse facility adjacent to cabin.
Basic outhouse facility adjacent to cabin.

properties.Label: Highway Glacier (Penny Ice Cap)
properties.Description: This glacier extends north to join the main body of the Penny Ice Cap.

properties.Label: Icebergs
properties.Description: Icebergs are a common sight on the approach from the north side of the valley.

properties.Label: June Valley
properties.Description: Scenic view looking north up the June and Owl river valleys

properties.Label: Sandbanks
properties.Description: Some dried up stretches of the Owl River provide great walking on hard packed sand.

properties.Label: Mount Asgard Lookout
properties.Description: This location provides the best (and closest) view of Mount Asgard from the valley. South of this point the mountain is no longer visible.

properties.Label: Mount Thor lookout
properties.Description: General area to have the best view of the Thor peak.
